doc:
Adam Scott (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Scott_(actor) 0 Adam Paul Scott (born April 3, 1973) is an American actor, comedian, producer, and podcaster. He is known for his role as Ben Wyatt in the NBC sitcom Parks and Recreation. He has also appeared as Derek in the film Step Brothers, Johnny Meyer in The Aviator, Henry Pollard in the Starz sitcom Party Down, Ed Mackenzie in the HBO series Big Little Lies and Trevor in the NBC series The Good Place. Adam_Paul_Scott ( born April_3_,_1973 ) is an_American_actor , comedian , producer , and podcaster . He is_known for his_role as Ben_Wyatt in the_NBC_sitcom_Parks_and_Recreation . He has_also_appeared as Derek in the_film_Step_Brothers , Johnny_Meyer in The_Aviator , Henry_Pollard in the_Starz_sitcom_Party_Down , Ed_Mackenzie in the_HBO_series_Big_Little Lies_and Trevor in the_NBC_series The_Good_Place .
